item.title: softwarelist
item.description: picture inkscape: extract eps picutures from PDF files graphviz (dot): draw a flow-chart by command line geogebra: draw geometry graph. Useful command like tikz: research mendeley: paper management jabref: generate bib files

item.title: 20170407vim
item.description: #移动# - w 意味着向后移动，出现在单词首 - e 意味着向后移动，出现在单词末 - dw 删除所在位置直到下个单词的首字母，单词间的空格也被删去 - *匹配下
